free_text.Learning outcomes: Acquire knowledge about remote sensing (satellite or aerial) image processing[br/]Use remote sensing imagery in complex environmental problems[br/][br/]
free_text.Content: 1.	Sensors and captors[br/]2.	Basics of digital imagery[br/]3.	Information extraction[br/]4.	Image classification[br/]5.	Spectral unmixing[br/]6.	Multitemporal processing and change detection[br/]7.	Digital terrain models[br/]
free_text.Keywords: Imagery, remote sensing, signal processing, satellites
